name: muzzle
content:
muzzle noun [C]
(ANIMAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the mouth and nose of an animal, especially a dog: The dog is white with a black muzzle and ears. He rubbed the muzzle of a horse when it nosed up to him.
Tracy Morgan/Dorling Kindersley/GettyImages
a covering put over an animal's nose and mouth in order to prevent it from biting: She asked him to put a muzzle on his dog after it scared her children. Aggressive breeds must wear muzzles when they are taken off their owners' properties.
retales botijero/Moment Open/GettyImages

muzzle noun [C]
(GUN)
the end of a gun barrel, where the bullets come out: Always point the muzzle in a safe direction. He could feel the pressure of the gun muzzle behind his right ear.
